tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (RB even) (PP (IN at) (NP (NP (PRP$ your) (JJS darkest) (NN moment)) (SBAR (IN if) (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBP have) (NP (NP (JJ true) (NN joy)) (CC &) (NP (NP (NN peace)) (PP (IN in) (NP (PRP$ your) (NN heart))))))))) (. !))))
